resources.string: Made by the global BRD team. Version %1$s Build %2$s
It looks like you are using a third-party keyboard, which can record what you type and steal your Paper Key. Please switch to the default Android keyboard for extra protection.
There is a problem with your Android OS keystore, please contact support@breadwallet.com
Your BRD encrypted data was recently invalidated because your Android lock screen was disabled.
No internet connection found. Check your connection and try again.
Request timed out. Check your connection and try again.
Please enable storage permissions in your device settings: \"Settings\" > \"Apps\" > \"BRD\" > \"Permissions\".
Any BCH in your wallet can be accessed through the home screen.
BRD will not function properly unless screen-altering apps (such as Twilight) are disabled.
Enter a destination BCH address below. All BCH in your wallet at the time of the fork (%1$s) will be sent.
Your account does not contain any BCH, or you received BCH after the fork.
Payment Protocol Requests are not supported for BCH transactions
%1$s is requesting authentication using your bitcoin wallet
Please check with the service. You may need to try again.
Center your ID in the box
Processing time: This transaction is predicted to complete in %1$s.
The words entered do not match your paper key. Please try again.
To make sure everything was written down correctly, please enter the following words from your paper key.
This device isn\'t configured to send email with the iOS mail app.
BRD can not be authenticated due to a bug in your version of Android. [Please tap here for more information.]
This device isn\'t configured to send messages.
Fingerprint not recognized. Please try again.
You can customize your Face ID spending limit from the %1$s.
Use your face to unlock your BRD and send money up to a set limit.
You have not set up Face ID on this device. Go to Settings->Face ID & Passcode to set it up now.
This option is not recommended for time-sensitive transactions.
Send %1$s from this private key into your wallet? The bitcoin network will receive a fee of %2$s.
This private key is already in your wallet.
Transaction fees would cost more than the funds available on this private key.
Importing a wallet transfers all the money from your other wallet into your BRD wallet using a single transaction.
This private key is password protected.
Importing a wallet does not include transaction history or other details.
DEVICE SECURITY COMPROMISED\n Any \'jailbreak\' app can access BRD\'s keychain data and steal your bitcoin! Wipe this wallet immediately and restore on a secure device.
DEVICE SECURITY COMPROMISED\n Any \'jailbreak\' app can access BRD\'s keychain data and steal your bitcoin. Please only use BRD on a non-jailbroken device.
External apps cannot send money without approval from this device
Note: ONLY interact with this app when on one of the following domains
This app will be able to:
BRD does not have permission to access location services.
Your wallet name only appears in your account transaction history and cannot be seen by anyone else.
Enter Node IP address and port (optional)
Bitcoin payments can\'t be less than %1$s.
Bitcoin transaction outputs can\'t be less than %1$s.
Tap Continue to enable Face ID
Be the first to receive important support and product updates
A device passcode is needed to safeguard your wallet. Go to settings and turn passcode on.
A device screen lock is needed to safeguard your wallet. Go to \"Settings\" > \"Security\" > \"Screen lock\" and enable to continue.
Your Paper Key must be saved in case you ever lose or change your phone.
Your wallet may be out of sync. This can often be fixed by rescanning the blockchain.
Help improve BRD by sharing your anonymous data with us
Tap Continue to enable Touch ID
Tap here to enable fingerprint authentication
BRD has upgraded to using a 6-digit PIN. Tap Continue to upgrade.
Turn on notifications to receive special messages from BRD in the future.
Turn on notifications in Settings to receive alerts
Recover your BRD with your paper key.
The paper key you entered is invalid. Please double-check each word and try again.
Enter the paper key for the wallet you want to recover.
To reset your PIN, enter the words from your paper key into the boxes below.
You will not be able to send money while syncing.
If a transaction shows as completed on the network but not in your BRD.
You repeatedly get an error saying your transaction was rejected.
You will not be able to send money while syncing with the blockchain.
The only way to access your assets if you lose or upgrade your phone.
Protects your BRD from unauthorized users.
Conveniently unlock your BRD and send money up to a set limit.
BRD is not allowed to access the camera
Go to Settings to allow camera access.
BRD is not allowed to access the camera
The destination is your own address. You cannot send to yourself.
You must have at least %1$s in your wallet in order to transfer this type of token. Would you like to go to your Ethereum wallet now?
The destination address is not a valid %1$s address.
Pasteboard does not contain a valid %1$s address.
Sending is disabled during a full rescan.
Warning: this is a legacy bitcoin address. Are you sure you want to send Bitcoin Cash to it?
Insufficient funds to cover the transaction fee.
Please enter an amount to send.
Network Fee conditions are being downloaded. Please try again.
Bitcoin addresses are intended for single use only.
Re-use reduces privacy for both you and the recipient and can result in loss if the recipient doesn\'t directly control the address.
Only send Bitcoin (BTC) to this address. Any other asset sent to this address will be lost permanently.
Enabling SegWit is an irreversible feature. Are you sure you want to continue?
Thank you for helping move bitcoin forward.

SegWit support is still a beta feature.

Once SegWit is enabled, it will not be possible to disable it. You will be able to find the legacy address under Settings. 

Some third-party services, including crypto trading, may be unavailable to users who have enabled SegWit. In case of emergency, you will be able to generate a lecacy address from Preferences > Bitcoin Settings. 

SegWit will automatically be enabled for all users in a future update.
Help improve BRD by sharing your anonymous data with us. This does not include any financial information. We respect your financial privacy.
Your paper key is the only way to restore your BRD if your phone is lost, stolen, broken, or upgraded.\n\nWe will show you a list of words to write down on a piece of paper and keep safe.
You last wrote down your paper key on %1$s
You can customize your Touch ID spending limit from the %1$s.
You can customize your Fingerprint Authentication Spending Limit from the Fingerprint Authorization Spending Limit screen
You have not enabled fingerprint authentication on this device. Go to Settings -> Security to set up fingerprint authentication.
Use your fingerprint to unlock your BRD and send money up to a set limit.
You have not set up Touch ID on this device. Go to Settings->Touch ID & Passcode to set it up now.
You will be asked to enter your 6-digit PIN to send any transaction over your spending limit, and every 48 hours since the last time you entered your 6-digit PIN.
Waiting to be confirmed. Some merchants require confirmation to complete a transaction. Estimated time: 1-2 hours.
Please unlock your Android device to continue.
Remember this PIN. If you forget it, you won\'t be able to access your assets.
Your PIN will be used to unlock your BRD and send money.
Authorize to copy wallet address to clipboard
Please enter your PIN to authorize this transaction.
Please enter your PIN to continue.
Open the BRD iPhone app to set up your wallet.
There was an error loading the content. Please try again.
BRDwallet has changed its name to BRD, with a brand new look and some new features.\n\nIf you need help, look for the (?) in the top right of most screens.
Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?
To start a new wallet or restore an existing wallet, you must first erase the wallet that is currently installed. To continue, enter the current wallet\'s Paper Key.
Starting or recovering another wallet allows you to access and manage a different BRD wallet on this device.
Your current wallet will be removed from this device. If you wish to restore it in the future, you will need to enter your Paper Key.
Write down each word in order and store it in a safe place.

This token has been delisted because the issuer decided to move to their own blockchain.\nDont worry! You will be able to send these tokens out from the BRD app to another platform that supports the token swap.\nFor more details, please visit our support page.
BRD cannot proceed due to a bug in your app version. Please contact support with issue #%1$d.
